metadata.title: CVE-2012-6618 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The av_probe_input_buffer function in libavformat/utils.c in FFmpeg before1.0.2, when running with certain -probesize values, allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (crash) via a crafted MP3 file, possiblyrelated to frame size or lack of sufficient "frames to estimate rate."

criterions.comment: libav package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
